stable-limit.name: Stable Limit
stable-limit.desc: Increases the number of pets that your character can store in the stable.

queue-limit.name: Queue Limit
queue-limit.desc: Increases the maximum size of your character's queue, allowing you to queue more things at once.

queue-speed.name: Queue Speed
queue-speed.desc: Decreases the time it takes for queued items to complete.

bank-limit.name: Bank Limit
bank-limit.desc: Increases the number of items that your character can store in the bank.

backpack-limit.name: Backpack Limit
backpack-limit.desc: Increases the number of items that your character can carry in their backpack.

pet-limit.name: Pet Limit
pet-limit.desc: Increases the number of pets that can follow your character.

building-limit.name: Building Limit
building-limit.desc: Increases the number of buildings your character can have.
